name: Sonar (JordanDubeMedia)
description:
Your child keeps losing their teddy bear to the dark depths of the ocean! 

How many times can you find it before insanity overwhelms you in this procedurally generated horror game?

W - Forwards

S - Backwards

A - Turn Left

D - Turn Right

L - Take Pills

P - Shoot at monsters (What? No, no, there's no monsters)

Prototype made for GBJAM8. Hopefully I'll have time to clean it up and design an actual story...

Thanks for playing!

Made by Jordan Dube --> @Jordanopoly
